```{r read_raw}
doc <- xml2::read_xml(raw.file)

kdb <- data.frame(qid = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/QID")),
                  title = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/TITLE")),
                  vuln_type = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/VULN_TYPE")),
                  category = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/CATEGORY")),
                  severity = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/SEVERITY_LEVEL")),
                  patchable = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/PATCHABLE")),
                  published = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/LAST_SERVICE_MODIFICATION_DATETIME")),
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
kdb$published <- as.POSIXct.POSIXlt(strptime(x = kdb$published, format = "%Y-%m-%dT%TZ"))

kable(head(kdb)) %>% kable_styling()
```

```{r add_cve, echo=FALSE}
cve <- data.frame(cve = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/CVE")),
                  title = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/TITLE")),
                  vuln_type = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/VULN_TYPE")),
                  category = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/CATEGORY")),
                  severity = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/SEVERITY_LEVEL")),
                  patchable = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/PATCHABLE")),
                  published = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/LAST_SERVICE_MODIFICATION_DATETIME")),
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
cve$published <- as.POSIXct.POSIXlt(strptime(x = cve$published, format = "%Y-%m-%dT%TZ"))

kable(head(cve)) %>% kable_styling()

# Crear tabla de frecuencias
tabla_frecuencias <- table(cve$category)

# Crear dataframe
datos <- data.frame(category = names(tabla_frecuencias), value = tabla_frecuencias)

# Grafico de barras agrupado por categoria
ggplot(datos, aes(x=category, y=value, fill=category)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  labs(title = "Nº Vulnerabilidades de cada Categoria", x = "categorias", y = "Frecuencia de categorías")

```

```{r add_cwe, echo=FALSE}
cwe <- data.frame(cve = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/CWE")),
                  title = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/TITLE")),
                  vuln_type = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/VULN_TYPE")),
                  category = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/CATEGORY")),
                  severity = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/SEVERITY_LEVEL")),
                  patchable = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/PATCHABLE")),
                  published = rvest::html_text(rvest::html_elements(doc, xpath = "//VULN/LAST_SERVICE_MODIFICATION_DATETIME")),
                  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
cwe$published <- as.POSIXct.POSIXlt(strptime(x = cwe$published, format = "%Y-%m-%dT%TZ"))

kable(head(cwe)) %>% kable_styling()

# Crear tabla de frecuencias
tabla_frecuencias <- table(cwe$severity)

# Crear dataframe
datos <- data.frame(category = names(tabla_frecuencias), value = tabla_frecuencias)

# Grafico de barras agrupado por categoria
ggplot(datos, aes(x=category, y=value, fill=category)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  labs(title = "Nº Vulnerabilidades por severidad", x = "severidad", y = "Frecuencia de la severidad")

```
